Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

28 using namespace KEMField;
29 using namespace Kassiopeia;
30 using namespace katrin;
31 
32 int main( int anArgc, char** anArgv )
33 {
34  // read in xml file
35  KXMLTokenizer tXMLTokenizer;
36  KVariableProcessor tVariableProcessor;
37  KFormulaProcessor tFormulaProcessor;
38  KIncludeProcessor tIncludeProcessor;
39  KLoopProcessor tLoopProcessor;
40  KConditionProcessor tConditionProcessor;
41  KTagProcessor tTagProcessor;
42  KElementProcessor tElementProcessor;
43 
44  tVariableProcessor.InsertAfter( &tXMLTokenizer );
45  tFormulaProcessor.InsertAfter( &tVariableProcessor );
46  tIncludeProcessor.InsertAfter( &tFormulaProcessor );
47  tLoopProcessor.InsertAfter( &tIncludeProcessor );
48  tConditionProcessor.InsertAfter( &tLoopProcessor );
49  tTagProcessor.InsertAfter( &tConditionProcessor );
50  tElementProcessor.InsertAfter( &tTagProcessor );
51 
52  KTextFile tInputFile;
53  tInputFile.AddToBases( "TestZonalHarmonics.xml" );
54  tInputFile.AddToPaths( string( CONFIG_DEFAULT_DIR ) + string( "/Validation" ) );
55  tXMLTokenizer.ProcessFile( &tInputFile );
56 
57  // read in command line parameters
58  if( anArgc != 2 )
59  {
60  mainmsg( eWarning ) << "usage:" << ret;
61  mainmsg << "TestZonalHarmonicsConvergence <FIELDNAME>"<< eom;
62  return -1;
63  }
64 
65  string tElFieldName = anArgv[1];
66  string tMagFieldName = anArgv[2];
67  mainmsg( eNormal ) <<"Using electric Field with name <"<<tElFieldName<<">"<<eom;
68  mainmsg( eNormal ) <<"Using magentic Field with name <"<<tMagFieldName<<">"<<eom;
69 
70  // initialize root
71  TApplication tApplication( "Test ZonalHarmonics", 0, NULL );
72 
73  TCanvas tConvergenceCanvas( "convergence_canvas", "convergence radius" );
74  TGraph tElCentralExpansionGraph;
75 // TGraph tMagCentralExpansionGraph;
76 
77 // TCanvas tMagFieldCanvas( "magnetic_field_canvas", "magnetic field strength" );
78 // TGraph tMagStrengthGraph;
79 
80 
81  KElectrostaticBoundaryFieldWithKGeoBag* tElField =
82  KToolbox::GetInstance().Get<KElectrostaticBoundaryFieldWithKGeoBag>( tElFieldName );
83  tElField->Initialize();
84 
85 // KStaticElectromagnetField* tMagField =
86 // KToolbox::GetInstance().Get<KStaticElectromagnetField>( tMagFieldName );
87 // tMagField->Initialize();
88 
89  KEMField::KSmartPointer<KGeoBag::KGBEMConverter> tElConverter = tElField->GetConverter();
90 // KGElectromagnetConverter* tMagConverter = tMagField->GetConverter();
91 
92  KElectricZHFieldSolver* tElZHSolver = dynamic_cast<KElectricZHFieldSolver*>(&(*tElField->GetFieldSolver()));
93 // KZonalHarmonicMagnetostaticFieldSolver* tMagZHSolver = dynamic_cast<KZonalHarmonicMagnetostaticFieldSolver*>(&(*tMagField->GetFieldSolver()));
94 
95  double tZ = -12.2;
96  double tR = 0.;
97  KGeoBag::KThreeVector tPosition;
98 
99  for( int i=0; i<5000; i++)
100  {
101  tZ = -12.2 + i*2.*12.2/5000.;
102  mainmsg( eNormal ) << "Electric Field: Z Position: " << i <<"/5000" << reom;
103  for ( int j=0; j<5000; j++ )
104  {
105  tR = j*0.001;
106 
107  tPosition.SetComponents(0.,tR,tZ);
108  if (!tElZHSolver->UseCentralExpansion( tElConverter->GlobalToInternalPosition( tPosition ) ) )
109  {
110  tElCentralExpansionGraph.SetPoint(i, tZ, tR-0.001);
111  break;
112  }
113  }
114  }
115 
116 // KThreeVector tCheckMagfield;
117

119 // {

121 // mainmsg( eNormal ) << "Magnetic Field: Z Position: " << i <<"/5000" << reom;
122 
123 // tMagField->CalculateField(KThreeVector(0.0,0.0,tZ),0.0,tCheckMagfield);
124 // tMagStrengthGraph.SetPoint(i, tZ, tCheckMagfield.Magnitude() );

128

131 // if (!tMagZHSolver->UseCentralExpansion( tMagneticPosition ) )
132 // {
133 // tMagCentralExpansionGraph.SetPoint(i, tZ, tR-0.001);
134 // break;
135 // }
136 // }
137 // }
138 
139  tConvergenceCanvas.cd( 0 );
140  tElCentralExpansionGraph.SetMarkerColor( kRed );
141  tElCentralExpansionGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
142  tElCentralExpansionGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
143  tElCentralExpansionGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
144  tElCentralExpansionGraph.SetTitle( "Convergence Graph" );
145  tElCentralExpansionGraph.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "Z Position" );
146  tElCentralExpansionGraph.GetYaxis()->SetTitle( "Convergence Radius" );
147  tElCentralExpansionGraph.Draw( "AP" );
148

153 // tMagCentralExpansionGraph.SetLineWidth( 0.1 );
154 // tMagCentralExpansionGraph.SetTitle( "Convergence Graph" );

156 // tMagCentralExpansionGraph.GetYaxis()->SetTitle( "Convergence Radius" );
157 // tMagCentralExpansionGraph.Draw( "AP" );
158 
159 // tMagFieldCanvas.cd( 0 );

165 // tMagStrengthGraph.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "Z Position" );
166 // tMagStrengthGraph.GetYaxis()->SetTitle( "Field" );
167 // tMagStrengthGraph.Draw( "AP" );
168 
169  tApplication.Run();
170 
171  // deinitialize kassiopeia
172 
173  return 0;
174 }
